text: Fhe Bakɨme mba tuavra nzan ndavi havhari fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Nde fharav Taitus ndava havhargim, ana nde ana muuŋgi ne bun nza suaŋgi. Mba tɨvara, Fhe Bakɨme vhɨra nzan ndavi havhargi. Taitus zav, khaŋ nza suaŋgi, nde guigira na ganɨngeŋ nzuav vuzvuk bakɨme ki. Nde vhɨra wari wo muuŋgi bigi, nde guigira nta kora muuŋgiap, nde guigira na phorgɨp ndava bavira kɨrga ndɨkndɨk guigira nden kɨvgi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, gu guigira ne nzuav ndikndiga mbatɨga mbui.
